a.n: Thomas & Friends: Big World! Big Adventures! XXIII (19)

p.k: When some of the engines think that life would be easier without Diesel, he decides to teach them a lesson by hiding. When nobody comes to look for him, he covers himself in glow-in-the-dark paint and pretends to be haunting them in their dreams. But his plan backfires and it's him that ends up getting a surprise.
